paragraphs.text:
watchLogsRaw = sc.textFile("/cbs/watch_logs.csv")

# raw data's header is
# post_visitor_high_id,post_visitor_low_id,page_event_var2_desc,post_evar31_desc,page_nm,event_dt_ut,geo_country_cd,geo_region_cd,geo_city_nm,geo_zip_cd
header = watchLogsRaw.first()
watchLogsRaw = watchLogsRaw.filter(lambda l: l != header) \
    .map(lambda l: l.split(",")) \
    .filter(lambda l: len(l[4]) > 10 and l[3].isnumeric() ) \
    .map(lambda l: (l[3], l[4])).cache()

def uniqueByVideoId(a,b):
    if len(a) > len(b):
        return a
    return b

def makeNeatRow(d):
    videoId = d[0]
    feature = d[1]

    return Row (videoId=videoId, feature=feature, createdAt=dt.datetime.now())

watchLogsRaw = watchLogsRaw.reduceByKey(uniqueByVideoId)
watchLogs_Tao = watchLogsRaw.map(makeNeatRow)
sqlContext.createDataFrame(watchLogs_Tao).write.saveAsTable("video_features_omniture", mode="overwrite")
%sql select videoId, feature as title from video_features_omniture where feature like '%Need To Talk%' order by videoId

video_title_array = sqlContext.sql(" select videoId, feature as title from video_features_omniture order by videoId").collect()
print len(video_title_array)

video_title_array = sqlContext.sql("SELECT videoId, title, CONCAT(title, ' ', description) as document, imageUrl FROM videos order by videoId").collect()
#video_title_array = sqlContext.sql("SELECT videoId, title, description as document, imageUrl FROM videos order by videoId").collect()
print video_title_array[1]
print len(video_title_array)

paragraphs.title: Train video titles in table: videos
paragraphs.text:
import string
import re
import numpy as np

video_count = len(video_title_array)
print video_count
regex = re.compile('[%s]' % re.escape(string.punctuation))
voc_set = set()
stop_words = [u'a', u'about', u'above', u'after', u'again', u'against', u'all', u'am', u'an', u'and', u'any', u'are', u"aren't", u'as', u'at', u'be', u'because', u'been', u'before', u'being', u'below', u'between', u'both', u'but', u'by', u"can't", u'cannot', u'could', u"couldn't", u'did', u"didn't", u'do', u'does', u"doesn't", u'doing', u"don't", u'down', u'during', u'each', u'few', u'for', u'from', u'further', u'had', u"hadn't", u'has', u"hasn't", u'have', u"haven't", u'having', u'he', u"he'd", u"he'll", u"he's", u'her', u'here', u"here's", u'hers', u'herself', u'him', u'himself', u'his', u'how', u"how's", u'i', u"i'd", u"i'll", u"i'm", u"i've", u'if', u'in', u'into', u'is', u"isn't", u'it', u"it's", u'its', u'itself', u"let's", u'me', u'more', u'most', u"mustn't", u'my', u'myself', u'no', u'nor', u'not', u'of', u'off', u'on', u'once', u'only', u'or', u'other', u'ought', u'our', u'ours', u'ourselves', u'out', u'over', u'own', u'same', u"shan't", u'she', u"she'd", u"she'll", u"she's", u'should', u"shouldn't", u'so', u'some', u'such', u'than', u'that', u"that's", u'the', u'their', u'theirs', u'them', u'themselves', u'then', u'there', u"there's", u'these', u'they', u"they'd", u"they'll", u"they're", u"they've", u'this', u'those', u'through', u'to', u'too', u'under', u'until', u'up', u'very', u'was', u"wasn't", u'we', u"we'd", u"we'll", u"we're", u"we've", u'were', u"weren't", u'what', u"what's", u'when', u"when's", u'where', u"where's", u'which', u'while', u'who', u"who's", u'whom', u'why', u"why's", u'with', u"won't", u'would', u"wouldn't", u'you', u"you'd", u"you'll", u"you're", u"you've", u'your', u'yours', u'yourself', u'yourselves']

for rx in range(video_count):
    title = video_title_array[rx]["document"]
    for word in title.split():
        word = regex.sub('', word).lower()
        if len(word) > 1 and word not in stop_words: voc_set.add(word)

voc = tuple(voc_set)
X = np.zeros((video_count, len(voc)), np.int64)
for rx in range(video_count):
    title = video_title_array[rx]["document"]
    for word in title.split():
        word = regex.sub('', word).lower()
        if word in voc:
            wIdx = voc.index(word)
            X[rx][wIdx] += 1

import lda
n_topics = 100
lda_model = lda.LDA(n_topics=n_topics, n_iter=500, random_state=1)
lda_model.fit(X)

paragraphs.title: Show top words in all topics
paragraphs.text:
print X.shape
n_top_words = 12
for i, topic_dist in enumerate(lda_model.topic_word_):
    topic_words = np.array(voc)[np.argsort(topic_dist)][:-(n_top_words + 1):-1]
    print('Topic {}: {}'.format(i, ' '.join(topic_words)))

Row(videoId=u'705328707764', title=u'Top international prospects', document=u"Top international prospects Our 'Inside College Basketball' analysts breakdown the top ranked international power forwards, centers, and shooting guards heading into the NBA Draft.", imageUrl=u'http://sports.cbsimg.net/images/cbsmedia/video/thumbnails/international_1078020_640x360.jpg')
Row(videoId=u'707076163664', title=u'Rade Zagorac player breakdown', document=u'Rade Zagorac player breakdown College basketball writer Sam Vecenie breaks down Smederevo small forward and NBA draft prospect Rade Zagorac.', imageUrl=u'http://sports.cbsimg.net/images/cbsmedia/video/thumbnails/Rade_Zagorac_1079731_640x360.jpg')

paragraphs.text: userIds = ["236407916", "688435115", "503788871", "1555466411","3113763519", "3047304332"] userId = userIds[5] watchVideos = sqlContext.sql("select v.videoId, v.title, us.score, v.imageUrl, v.videoUrl from user_scores us, videos v where us.videoId = v.videoId and us.userId='{0}'".format(userId)).collect() print "%table" print "{0}\t{1}\t{2}\t{3}\t{4}".format("VideoId", "Title", "MatchTitle", "MatchImage", "image") for r in watchVideos: result = matchWithVideoId(r["videoId"], []) matchVideoId = video_title_array[result[-1]]["videoId"] if matchVideoId == r["videoId"]: result = matchWithVideoId(r["videoId"], result) matchVideoImage = video_title_array[result[-1]]["imageUrl"] matchVideoTitle = video_title_array[result[-1]]["title"] print "{0}\t{1}\t{2}\t%html ".format( \ r["videoId"], r["title"], matchVideoTitle, matchVideoImage, r["imageUrl"])
